We may need to address the exception, but may not support XPosition.
Since engine don't support this property, let's hide it from IStyleDesign api interface.
The set/getBackgroundPositionX and Y does not seem to work, so it is not in the script style interface. When it works in the engine, we can add it.

engine: BackgroundPositionX and Y are supported (verified 20051226),
Java based scripting: X is working, while Y isn't (tested 20051226).
